girth.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the size of something or someone large when you measure around them rather than measuring their height
girth.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: the enormous girth of the tree
He was a tall man, of considerable girth  (=he was fat).
girth.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a band of leather which is passed tightly around the middle of a horse to keep a saddle or load firmly in position
